Title: Relates to the calculation of selected operating aid per pupil for the Boquet Valley central school district
Summary: Relates to the calculation of selected operating aid per pupil for the Boquet Valley central school district; provides the date of reorganization, July 1, 2019, shall be used when calculating.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the calculation of selected operating aid per pupil for the Boquet Valley central school district
